title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: E-Learning-Based Language Education Course for Improved Learning Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply language learning content with over 80% accuracy to practical tasks through interactive activities provided in e-learning platforms.

Learners can transfer language skills learned in e-learning environments to near-transfer (similar situations requiring transfer) and far-transfer (novel situations requiring transfer) tasks at over 70% and 60% accuracy, respectively, based on experimental research methodologies.
Learners can select e-learning strategies suited to their thinking styles (freeform/conservative) to improve learning efficiency by over 20%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
